content.title: Introduction to Internationalization
content.body:
Internationalization(i18n) helps you to display the content of your application based on the locale of the device.

To incorporate i18n in your application, you must define the key-value pairs of the various fields, such as placeholders and texts. Here, key is the field and values are the translation of the keys in the required languages.

In this hike you will:

  • Configure locales specific to Spanish and English for an app
  • Add key-value pair for various texts displayed in the app for Spanish and English

When you’re ready, click Start!
